description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Attention, scientists! Today we'll embark on a virtual voyage using a powerful tool -
the digital microscope!  We'll test your skills in navigating and exploring specimens at different magnifications.
You will be looking at 4 different objective lenses the low-power lenses including the 4x and 10x
and the high-power lenses including the 40x and 100x. Now are you ready?
You will be given a red blood cell sample, and I want you to click on the the focus knob to adjust
the focus to see it more clearly! Now go scanning!
You are getting used to it now! Take your time to explore it!
Ready to explore the microscope using the 10x objective lens?
You are great! now moving on to the 10x objective lens, same instructions you can do it!
You are getting used to it now! Take your time to explore it!
Ready to explore the microscope using the 40x objective lens?
You did well! now moving on to the 40x objective lens, same instructions you can do it!
You are getting used to it now! Take your time to explore it!
Ready to explore the microscope using the 100x objective lens?
Amazing, that is how you navigate a specimen using the microscope
Well done you perfected the assessment task!
